summary: A Snow Elf Companion based of Dawnguard\'s Snow Elves
descriptionHtml:
Foeswyn is an adept spellsword Snow Elf  who can cast frostbite and heal himself when required.
He also has a retextured Elven Blade to acompany the Snow Elf Armorm his armor is a cpy of the playable armor with slightly better stats and there is two in his inventory for him and you.

He is a Companion based of the game\'s inbuilt vanilla companion system so best to make Use of UFO incase you have other companions 

ALTERNATIVLY you could try my Snow Elf Guild:-
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22705

If you wish to equipt him with all manner of weapons and armors, you certainly would need a mod like this:
Snow Elf Playable Race by iM1TCH
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22037

I felt like making another unique companion where you encounter in the Wilds, you can find Foewyn battleing a bunch of high level Falmer in Shimmermist Cave, North West toWhiterun.
This little cave to me is a sort of outlook for the Falmer if they could look that is) its location and overview of Whiterun gives me indictation of them keeping tabs of Whiterun\'s activity and perhaps a possible staging point for a future Falmer inasion of the Surface.

Refer to screenshots once they are up.
author: Beth
